nodes.bodyText: I think an import is a safe bet in this context.
No need for iterables.first since we access the statement immediately afterwards. Make it module.getStatements().get(0)
Should this be covered by preferXtendStubs above?
JavaDoc is outdated. There is no polymorphic dispatch.
